name: Treasure Hunt (Solrun)
description:
Controls:

WASD - Movement

Mouse - Click to dig

Play as the famous Indiana Jones' son, Kentucky Jones and face off against your greatest rival yet, your twin brother, Ohio Jones. The two of you will face off in a head-to-head duel to see who can uncover archaeological artifacts the fastest. The winner will become the favourite child.

7:45 pm GMT Tuesday, March 6 2018 - Added a restart button so you don't have to refresh the page if you lose.
